author: kohsuke
msg: fixed a problem in the XPath matcher where XPath like 'a/.' causes the matcher to fail to identify the match. I think the fundamental problem here is that the XPath class is unnecessarily generic, so we should probably cut it down so that it only handles the XML Schema subset of XPath.

author: kohsuke
msg: fixed the regression problem reported in 1.9 by Elena

author: kohsuke
msg: fixed a bug in the XPath parser where it accepts malformed XPath. Also simplified the parser a bit
